snippet.title: Creating Environment Art | Dev Diaries | Scars of Honor
snippet.description:
Download the BeastBurst App 👇
🍎 Apple App Store - https://beast.ly/7fZCVjQ
🤖 Google Play Store - https://beast.ly/Nnz53Bu

👕 The Beast Burst Merch Shop - https://beast.ly/OcdIiKU

Marvelous Community,
Meet Ivo, one of our Environment Artists.
He will walk you through the process and fundamentals of building an immersive world.
He is a very passionate artist and has proven many times how valuable he is for the team.

We hope you enjoy our Dev Diaries as much as we enjoy making them for you.

Don't hesitate to leave a comment and tell us what you think!

For more information, about how you can participate in the upcoming pre-alpha tests follow this link: https://www.scarsofhonor.com/start

Don't forget to like us, share us, and hit the bell, to make sure you don't miss our next videos!

Official Links:
Discord: https://discord.gg/jDSuQVgwHF
Website: https://www.scarsofhonor.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ScarsOfHonor.Official/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/scars.of.honor/
Twitter: ​https://twitter.com/scars_of_honor/
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/ScarsofHonor/

#MMORPG #devdiary #madewithunity #madewithunity3d #gamedevelopment #game  #gamingpc #indiegame #gamedev  #indiedev #indiegamedev #RPG #scarsofhonor  #developerdiaries

Chapters:
Intro - 0:00
Chapter 1 | The World Map - 1:08
Chapter 2 | The Testing Grounds - 1:58
Chapter 3 | The Design - 3:03
Chapter 4 | Mood - 3:47
Chapter 5 | Assets - 4:42
Outro - 6:07
